name: Logojoy Inc.
description: Developer of a logo design and brand identity platform designed to create professional-quality logos. The company's platform uses proprietary machine and deep learning models in various aspects of the design, enabling business owners to create logos in a convenient and affordable way.
one_liner: Developer of a logo design and brand identity platform designed to create professional-quality logos. The company's platform uses proprietary machine and deep learning models in various aspects of the design, enabling business owners to create logos in a convenient and affordable way.
